refentry:
$Date$ $Revision$
elements setinfo setinfo Element
setinfo &setinfo.purpose;
&setinfo.synopsis.gen; Description
SetInfo contains meta-information about an entire set of Books.
Processing expectations
&format.suppress; Many of the elements in this wrapper may be used in presentation, but they are not generally printed as part of the formatting of the wrapper. The wrapper merely serves to identify where they occur.
&FutureChanges;
DocBook DTDChanges for V4.0
AuthorBlurb and Affiliation will be removed from the inline content of SetInfo in DocBook V4.0. A new wrapper element will be created to associate this information with authors, editors, and other contributors.
&FutureChanges;
DocBook DTDChanges for V5.0
The contents attribute will be removed.
&setinfo.parents.gen; &setinfo.children.gen;
Attributes
contents
Contents, if specified, should contain a list of all the IDs of the book-level subelements in the Set, presumably in their natural order.
See Also &setinfo.seealso.gen;
Examples
For examples, see &setinfo.example.seealso.gen;.
